data.title: add Scale9Sprite optimization
data.body:
1. Completely rewrite the slice-9 feature of ui::Scale9Sprite. The new Scale9Sprite inherits from Sprite with type default to `Sliced`.
2. Now the Slice sprite uses 16 vertices and 54 indices instead of the old 9 sprite way.
   The memory consumption is much lower than the previous implementation. And it is also more time efficient.
3. Fix a bug when scale9sprite shrink smaller than the center stretch area. 
4. A few minor change to use the new slice sprite in UI widgets. No behavior changed!  If you notice one, please report.

Note: **SpriteBatchNode**  can't support the new sliced sprite at the moment. In the past, it also the same. The original Scale9Sprite is a node, so it can't be added into the `SpriteBtachNode`.
But now the Sliced sprite is a Sprite which means it should be OK when adding it to the `SpriteBatchNode`.  

I suggest we mention this restrict in the release note and fix it in the future release. Thoughts?

@dabingnn  @ricardoquesada  @super626  Please help me to review this PR.

Any testing or suggestions will be welcome.

Thanks.

data.title: Run on Web error when using --advanced property
data.body:
Hi Cocos team!
I'm using v3.8.1 for my project. When I compiled project with command:

```
cocos compile -p web -m release 
```

then project run on Browser ok.
But when I compile with command:

```
cocos compile -p web -m release --advanced
```

then run on Browser, it show error **Cannot found module parseuri when load project.json file.**
Thanks!

data.body: Squashed from https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/pull/14159

data.title: Improved JSCallbackWrapper with generational GC and fix the issue
data.body: Fixed #14124

data.title: AudioEngine::setFinishCallback error
data.body:
当使用 AudioEngine 播放比较长的音乐时， 接收不到 setFinishCallback 回调， 且在update里面一直检测到它的状态为 PLAYING。
Windows 上 cocos2d-x 3.6 版本可用， 3.8，3.8.1 均不可用。
Mac OSX 上 3.8.1 可用。
使用测试用例 cpp-tests 中的 AudioControlTest，把 background.mp3 换成一个长点的音乐即可再现。

data.title: Optimize scale9sprite
data.body:
1. Add Sliced sprite support for Sprite class and rewrite the original scale9sprite. The new Scale9Sprite inherit from Sprite with type default to `Sliced`.
2. Now the Slice sprite uses 16 vertices and 54 indices instead of the old 9 sprite way.
   The memory consumption is lower than previous implementation. And the computation is also more efficient.
3. Fix a bug when scale9sprite shrink smaller than the center stretch area. 
4. A few minor change to use the new slice sprite in UI widgets. No behavior changed!  If you notice one, please report.

Note: **SpriteBatchNode**  can't support the new sliced sprite at the moment. In the past, it also the same. The original Scale9Sprite is a node, so it can't be added into the `SpriteBtachNode`.
But now the Sliced sprite is a Sprite which means it should be OK when adding it to the `SpriteBatchNode`.  

I suggest we mention this restrict in the release note and fix it in the future release. Thoughts?

@dabingnn  @ricardoquesada  @super626  Please help me to review this PR.

Any testing or suggestions will be welcome.

Thanks.

mac模拟器设置尺寸： 960X640
cocos2dx版本：3.8.1
实际模拟器启动显示 明显偏大  大概显示分辨率在1920X1280左右（2倍）

data.title: Inconsistent calling of AppDelegate::applicationWillEnterForeground() on iOS vs Android
data.body:
On iOS and Mac, the method AppDelegate::applicationWillEnterForeground() is only called after a game resumes. Not on first launch.

But on Android, AppDelegate::applicationWillEnterForeground() is called after resuming AND on first launch.

This result in inconsistent behavior of games on different platforms, where the behavior can and should be consistent.

More info: http://discuss.cocos2d-x.org/t/applicationwillenterforeground-always-call/24418

data.title: Fix naming typos
data.body: This fixes minor typos in `cocos/platform`.

data.title: Sprite3D AABB bug report
data.body:
http://discuss.cocos2d-x.org/t/sprite3d--meshes-size-always-0/24462

Sprite3d::_meshes.size() = 0

always.

It drives Sprite3D::getAABB() dumb.

And, it incapacitate Ray.intersact() function from any processes.

data.title: Physics: ContactListener Collision ordering bug
data.body:
I have a platform which has a PhysicsBody(Box). This platform has a child node with a PhysicsBody(EdgeBody) acting as a trigger. 

The problem is even though the player landed inside the trigger first, the collision of the platforms body is detected first. 

For example the player lands in the middle hitting the top trigger but still dies, because the collision is somehow detected in the platform body first 

This never happened in 3.4 and started happening when upgrading to 3.7-3.8.

Here is a picture showing the body setup :
![bug](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/4009589/10614466/c3eb88c8-775a-11e5-8087-1ee6e6a43b1c.PNG)

data.title: V3: updated winrt temporary app certificates expiration dates
data.body: This pull request updates the winrt temporary app certificates expiration dates. The certificate for the win8.1-universal js template had expired. All certificates are renewed for one year.

data.title: Android: Labels are crashing.

The cocos2d labels aren't working on Android.
They produce a crash.

data.title: check light enable or not when switching shader
Is Zindex of a ccui.WebView can be modify?
data.body:
Hi, I'm using cocos2d-x JS framework to test `ccui.WebView` functionality.
I know `setLocalZOrder` does not work for `ccui.WebView`.
But I wonder if there is a way to bring it to front or send it to back?
It seems that the `ccui.WebView` is always in the front in currently 3.8.1 ver., will it support the functionality I describe above?

Thanks in advance

data.title: Fix javascript project can't be opened directly in visual studio 2015
data.body: Fix javascript project can't be opened directly in visual studio 2015.

data.title: UIRichText does not handle well "\n"
data.body:
Most of it from:
http://discuss.cocos2d-x.org/t/does-richtext-support-multiple-line-of-text/21105/9

It only handles a element "\n", when it is in the middle of the text all element goes crazy.
